name: temp-mail-next-js
description: Secure, fast, and SEO-optimized Temp Mail SaaS frontend

scripts.preview: opennextjs-cloudflare build --config wrangler.frontend.jsonc && opennextjs-cloudflare preview --config wrangler.frontend.jsonc
scripts.deploy: opennextjs-cloudflare build --config wrangler.frontend.jsonc && opennextjs-cloudflare deploy --config wrangler.frontend.jsonc
scripts.upload: opennextjs-cloudflare build --config wrangler.frontend.jsonc && opennextjs-cloudflare upload --config wrangler.frontend.jsonc
